00019 #ifndef YARD_DATE_H
00020 #define YARD_DATE_H
00021 
00022 #include "xmlnode.h"
00023 #include "ys_build.h"
00024 
00025 class otl_datetime;
00026 class wxDateTime;
00027 class YardDate: public XMLNode
00028 {
00029  public:
00030     
00031     YardDate() { setName("datetime"); }
00032     YardDate(const string& xml): XMLNode(xml, XMLNode::Str) {}
00033     YardDate(const otl_datetime& time);
00034     YardDate(const wxDateTime& time);
00035     YardDate(const XMLNode& node);
00036  
00037     unsigned int GetYear() const
00038         { return ToInt(child("year").data()); }
00039     unsigned int GetMonth() const
00040         { return ToInt(child("month").data()); }
00041     unsigned int GetDay() const
00042         { return ToInt(child("day").data()); }
00043     unsigned int GetHour() const
00044         { return ToInt(child("hour").data()); }
00045     unsigned int GetMinute() const
00046         { return ToInt(child("minute").data()); }
00047     unsigned int GetSecond() const
00048         { return ToInt(child("second").data()); }
00049     unsigned int GetFraction() const
00050         { return ToInt(child("fraction").data()); }
00051     unsigned int GetFracPrecision() const
00052         { return ToInt(child("fraction").property("precision")); }
00053 
00054     void SetYear(unsigned int year)
00055         { child("year").setData(ToStr(year)); }
00056     void SetMonth(unsigned int month)
00057         { child("month").setData(ToStr(month)); }
00058     void SetDay(unsigned int day)
00059         { child("day").setData(ToStr(day)); }
00060     void SetHour(unsigned int hour)
00061         { child("hour").setData(ToStr(hour)); }
00062     void SetMinute(unsigned int minute)
00063         { child("minute").setData(ToStr(minute)); }
00064     void SetSecond(unsigned int second)
00065         { child("second").setData(ToStr(second)); }
00066     void SetFraction(unsigned int frac, unsigned int precision = YS_DEFAULT_TIME_PRECISION)
00067         { child("fraction").setData(ToStr(frac, precision)); }
00068     void SetFracPrecision(int precision) 
00069         { child("fraction").setProperty("precision", ToStr(precision)); }        
00070  
00071     YardDate& operator=(const otl_datetime& time);
00072     YardDate& operator=(const wxDateTime& time);
00073     
00074     string ToString() const;
00075     string DayString() const;
00076     
00077 };
00078 #endif
